ComicInfo.Summary:
After last issue's cliffhanger, US President Arcadia Alvarado is acting fast against the biggest event in world history. "Drop everything, spend everything. Give me a damn gun." "It won't be a war. It'll be a slaughter." "Isn't that exactly what the post-truth bastards do?" Jump onboard as the conclusion to Saucer Country heads one step closer to the finishing lineâ€¦ and the end of everything!
